MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Greenbank Court and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to carry out testing on equipment, we need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.25AM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work in conjunction with council engineers to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 12.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11.06AM on 09 January 2021.
